game.name: Metal Animal
game.description: Metal Animals to the rescue! Control a team of cute and furry animals with weapons, and defend the tank from the enemy invasion. Stop the evil animals from destroying your tank! Features: - Innovative drag and drop mechanic: Drag and place metal animals onto strategic positions on your tank. - Unlimited waves of enemies - Different animals to control: foxes, cats, pandas, sheep - they all come with guns
game.metaTitle: Metal Animal,  Games - Play Online Free : Atmegame.com
game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Metal Animal at atmegame.com ! We have selected this  games for best excitement and thrill in you!
game.metaKeyword: Metal Animal Game, Action Games,  Game, Online Games, Play Free Games, Flash Games, Browser Game
game.mobileControlKeys: CHOOSE FROM THE FIGHTERS AND SWIPE THEM UP ON TANK TO FIGHT
game.webControlKeys: DRAG SOLDIERS TO THE TANK TO DEFET ENEMY BY L CLICK OF MOUSE
